name: The Eidolon
overview: The Eidolon was one of two games that were part of Lucasfilm Games' second wave in December 1985. The other was Koronis Rift. Both took advantage of the fractal technology developed for Rescue on Fractalus!,further enhancing it. In The Eidolon, Rescue's fractal mountains were turned upside down and became the inside of a cave.
